title: Day 970
content:
# Day 970

The smell of campfire smoke is one of life's simple pleasures. It clings to your clothes, embedding itself in the fabric as a smoky reminder of nights under the stars. Luckily, I love the scent, so I don't mind carrying it with me. Just like campfire smoke, quality experiences and things tend to linger and hold value to those with a discerning eye. So be someone who has said eye ;)

![](https://miro.medium.com/0*Ze_1xcPfOY3gOWlo)

11/16/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
